name: ULTIMATE SOUL
description:
Humanity has been wiped out by their wars, and now their souls have escaped and possessed objects! Some of them have even created new bodies with their new-found power.

It's your job as a Reaper intern to capture them and return them to where they belong! And you're going to do that in the most efficient way possible, by shooting them. A lot.

Get new items and guns while you work, but be careful not to get too greedy and end up dying!
